channel.title: Event | CIVIL SOCIETY 7 - 2023 JAPAN
channel.description: The Civil Society 7 (C7) Group is one of the official Engagement Groups of the G7 and represents positions from the international civil society.

item.title: [Event Info] Japan C7 2023 Kick-Off Event
item.dc:creator: c7Admin
item.description:
On 1 January 2023, Japan assumed the G7 Presidency. The Japan Civil Society Coalition on G7 Summit 2023 has been acknowledged by the Japanese Government to coordinate the Civil 7 (C7) process. The coalition aims to establish a dialogue between civil society and the G7 governments and inform the outcomes of the 2023 G7 Summit. […]

The post [Event Info] Japan C7 2023 Kick-Off Event first appeared on CIVIL SOCIETY 7 - 2023 JAPAN.
item.content:encoded:
On 1 January 2023, Japan assumed the G7 Presidency. The Japan Civil Society Coalition on G7 Summit 2023 has been acknowledged by the Japanese Government to coordinate the Civil 7 (C7) process. The coalition aims to establish a dialogue between civil society and the G7 governments and inform the outcomes of the 2023 G7 Summit.

To introduce this process and provide a space for discussion, we invite you to attend the International C7 Kick-off on 24th January 2023. At the event, you will have the chance to meet the C7 Steering Committee and find out more about this year’s C7 Working Groups.

Participation in the Working Groups is open for international civil society and is not limited to actors from G7 countries. The event is open to everyone who is interested in C7, especially those who want to join one or more Working Groups.

 

Please download the presentation slide from here

 

■Date & Time: Tuesday, January 24, 2023, 12:00-14:00 GMT
■Venue: Zoom meeting
■Eligibility: Open to everyone

■Program (*Subject to change depending on the availability of speakers)
12.00 Welcome and introductions
12.10 Speech on G7 Agenda by Japan’s G7 Sous-Sherpa
12.20 C7 process & ToR of Working Groups
12.30 Presentation of the Working Groups by Coordinators
13.00 Breakout Discussions among Working Groups
13.25 Reporting back to the Plenary
13.55 Next Steps and Closing Remarks
14.00 End of the session

■Language: English
■Information Assurance: Please use the live transcription function on Zoom
■Organizers: C7

■Registration: https://forms.gle/jZEnHAoFyqUCGveS6

■Contact: C7 2023 Secretariat
Aoi Horiuchi (JANIC) horiuchi@janic.org
Juri Hiroya (JANIC) hiroya@janic.org
Kyoka Oimatsu (SDGs Japan) g7-2023@sdgs-japan.net

The post [Event Info] Japan C7 2023 Kick-Off Event first appeared on CIVIL SOCIETY 7 - 2023 JAPAN.
